Aboutme.label: About me
Aboutme.content: My journey in technology started with code but quickly evolved into something bigger: using software as a lever to scale real-world solutions. I have a background as a technical analyst, but I always operate with a product mindset, focused on efficiency and impact — not just on how to build, but why to build and what will actually move the needle. This portfolio reflects that approach: less fluff, more purposeful delivery.
